tha-ap476:0.3_0: he was poised with seniors and raveled by senior monks.
tha-ap476:1.3_0: A good seed sown in it,
tha-ap476:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap476:2.4_0: This is the fruit of the seed.
tha-ap476:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap476:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap476:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumanā.
tha-ap476:7.1_0: He is easy to see the fourth senior.
